docs.text:
What is Tensor-Learn




Tensor-Learn is your quick intro to machine learning with tensor.




Why bother writing




It began with a request. A new student in my lab asked me to give him a quick introduction to tensor for machine learning. My usual response to those kind of requests is to google search and share an url. However, this time. I was stuck. There was no such url I could find (with my trained information retrieval skills). So I ended up giving him a 'chalk' talk on the blackboard. I figured that this request might not be unique and I could use my knowledge to contribute to the community. Here it is... A quick intro to tensor learning. 




Who am I




I am ALMOST a final year PhD student in computer science. My thesis is on tensor learning for large-scale spatio-temporal data.
